## 3.3

### A
#### first way

```{r}
numbers=c(49:20)
dim(numbers)=c(5,6)
t(numbers)
```

####second way

```{r}
numbers=seq(49,20)
matrix(numbers, nrow=6, byrow=TRUE)
```

#### third way
```{r}
numbers=c(49:20)
ma=matrix(numbers, ncol =6)
temp2= t(ma)
temp2
```

### B
```{r}
temp2[3,]
```

### C
```{r}
temp2[,c(2,4)]
```
